definition: Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
surname Jing
bright/circumstance/scenery
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Shijingshan inner district of west Beijing
Mt Shijing in 珠海市[Zhu1 hai3 shi4], Guangdong/Shijingshan inner district of west Beijing
Jingshan Park (park in Beijing)

sentences.english: Yang Shulin is a gourd pyrography artist in Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 杨淑林，现居石景山区，葫芦烙画艺人。

sentences.english: Jingshan Park lies right to the north of the Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 景山公园坐落在故宫博物院的正北。

sentences.english: The Shijingshan Iron Smeltery, founded in 1919, predecessor of the Shoudu Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 首钢的前身是石景山炼钢厂，创立于1919年。

sentences.english: Eventually you will come to Jinghsen Qanyie Road and the moat and wall of the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 路的尽头就是紧靠故宫城墙和护城河的景山前街。

sentences.english: So, is Jingshan Park China’s answer to Hyde Park?
sentences.chinese: 那么，中国的景山公园是另一个海德公园吗？

sentences.english: I think I hear the answer calling out to me from Jingshan Park's dancing square.
sentences.chinese: 我想，在景山公园的舞蹈广场里，我听到了答案。

sentences.english: Beijing Jingshan School was founded in 1960.
sentences.chinese: 办学特色北京景山学校创办于1960年。

sentences.english: Then driving to visit Jingshan Park and Beihai Park.
sentences.chinese: 然后开车到景山公园和北海公园参观。
不管怎样，我再继续谈景山公园。

sentences.english: To solve this problem, Yuan Jinshan designed screw curve coiler can.
sentences.chinese: 为解决此问题，袁景山设计了螺旋形曲线斜管圈条盘。

sentences.english: As we climbed on to the Jingshan Mountain, a beautiful scene opened out before us.
sentences.chinese: 我们爬到景山上时，眼前展现出一幅美丽的景色。

sentences.english: In the same year, Emperor Sizong hanged himself in Jingshan Hill of Beijing, signifying the end of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 同年，明思宗在北京景山上吊自杀，标志着明朝灭亡。

sentences.english: Taijing School is located in the Nhorth-west Back Street of Yamenkou Village , Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 台京学校位于石景山区衙门口村西南后街。

sentences.english: At Shijingshan we passed the huge steel mill and the power plant.
sentences.chinese: 我们经过石景山这座大钢铁厂和发电厂。

sentences.english: Another worthwhile morning destination is Jingshan (Coal Hill) Park, behind the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 另一个值得早上去的目的地是景山公园。

sentences.english: The view with the Jiangshan Park, the park near the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 景山公园的景色啊，就是紫禁城附近的那个公园。

definition: Jingshan Park (park in Beijing)
Temple of Heaven (in Beijing)
Summer Palace in Beijing
Fragrant Hills Park, Beijing
Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Kunming Lake
Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing
Tanzhe Temple
Tower of Buddhist Incense in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)
Mutianyu, well-preserved section of the Great Wall 70km from Beijing
Longevity Hill in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
Badaling, a particular section of the Great Wall that is a favorite tourist destination
Deshengmen (Beijing)
